availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph B. Burnside (Garrard County, Kentucky, trader.)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, trader. Kentucky native. Son of Williamson G. and Elizabeth Burnside. Trader in Garrard County, Kentucky in 1860. Member of the council of ten of the pro-Confederate Provisional Government of Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard, Division 1, p. 249A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard, p. 706.
KYR-0004-033-0004.
